Posts.Content: hi binky.  had the same 6months ago  and am happy to say I've just had my 6 month check up and I'm clear,  i had 15 sessions then 5 directed at concerntrated area for the last 5,   it did irritate my skin a little towards the end , i came up in a few tiny little blisters , i was  useing  aqueus cream , and my nurse advised  useing 100% pure aloe vera , and to leave it in the fridge , for a more cooling affect,   . and don't use any harsh soap  i'd recommend getting a wireless none lace seamless bar , as my bra's erritated , and i couldn't go without .  treatment was a fine  and i had a lovely team , it fly's pass ,  and no problem at all with any unwanted side effects .  i felt a little tried  the last week , but i put that down to celcbrateing end off treatment ,  and keep the area out of the sun after radio .  good luck  DiX
Posts.Title: Radio therapy - cream/oil?

Posts.Content: hi terri   very sorry to hear of your scare, so welcome to the site i'm very new my self. reading all these different cases people are so positive helpful strong and kind...and .all get scared,... this web site really helps.. i think that like you ,we are one of the lucky one's , in that we have found it early  mine was also a pea size 1cm lump that i found had it  removed 2 weeks ago (met some lovely people in hospital who i'm going to meet for a coffee soon)  they done a test and it hasn't gone into the lymph glands ,i have al little scar under my arm pit  because it was small grade two i don't have to chemo just radio therapy, hopefully you will be the same, it's still early day's but i do feel possitive that we caught it early , have it removed  and still lead a healthy longer life, please if you want to know more please keep in contact i can tell you what my next steps are ie: oncologist  on  thur.... so good luck ,  will be thinking of you on monday  di XX

Posts.Content: hi all , and a happy healthy new year to all. i have been following all your replys to tamoxifen it sounds awful, and like yourself saradi  i've been taking it for about 2 1/2 month but have to stop because i have to go  back into hospital to have more cells removed, 'thur'', from around previous tumour, i didn't have any problems  a few hots sweets at night but no problem ( think i  use to get hot in the night be fore starting tamoxifen ) but  it seams to work very quicky, i'm a week late with my period... i was always very regular, it would be  just my luck when you can't fall pregnant  !!!!! any one else out there period's stopped  this quickly ? would love to hear any one else with this experience di X
